content: this text is about a legal case that was brought before the supreme court of rs the case number is sklep vrhovnega sodišča rs ii dor 2002016 and it was decided on november 8 2016 the case involved a dispute over the division of two real estate properties the court determined that the plaintiff and defendant each have a 50 share in the properties the court also dismissed certain claims and ordered the defendant to pay a sum of money the case went through various stages including a cost procedure a judgment in the first instance and an appeal to the supreme court the supreme court partially allowed a revision in the case the specific parties involved are not mentioned the text also mentions that the court of first instance made a decision in 2012 which was later appealed the appellant is now seeking leave to appeal to the supreme court the text does not provide specific details about the case or the parties involved

metadata.CASE_ID: Sklep Vrhovnega sodišča RS II DoR 200/2016, 8. 11. 2016
